data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Heads, Sam W. (2018): On the status of Araripegryllus romualdoi (Insecta: Orthoptera: Grylloidea) from the Cretaceous Santana Formation of Brazil. Zootaxa 4486 (1): 83-84, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4486.1.6
